entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
